item.title: How to Use Clean Energy Tax Credits Before They Disappear
item.description: There are just a few weeks left to tap federal programs that make purchasing an EV, heat pump, or solar panels more affordable.

item.title: In the Southwest, solar panels can help both photovoltaics and crops
item.description: Solar arrays can shade crops from sun while moisture cools the panels to increase their productivity.
